00015 #include "subprocess.h"
00016 
00017 #include "test.h"
00018 
00019 TEST(Subprocess, Ls) {
00020   Subprocess ls;
00021   EXPECT_TRUE(ls.Start("ls /"));
00022 
00023   // Pretend we discovered that stdout was ready for writing.
00024   ls.OnFDReady(ls.stdout_.fd_);
00025 
00026   EXPECT_TRUE(ls.Finish());
00027   EXPECT_NE("", ls.stdout_.buf_);
00028   EXPECT_EQ("", ls.stderr_.buf_);
00029 }
00030 
00031 TEST(Subprocess, BadCommand) {
00032   Subprocess subproc;
00033   EXPECT_TRUE(subproc.Start("ninja_no_such_command"));
00034 
00035   // Pretend we discovered that stderr was ready for writing.
00036   subproc.OnFDReady(subproc.stderr_.fd_);
00037 
00038   EXPECT_FALSE(subproc.Finish());
00039   EXPECT_EQ("", subproc.stdout_.buf_);
00040   EXPECT_NE("", subproc.stderr_.buf_);
00041 }
00042 
00043 TEST(SubprocessSet, Single) {
00044   SubprocessSet subprocs;
00045   Subprocess* ls = new Subprocess;
00046   EXPECT_TRUE(ls->Start("ls /"));
00047   subprocs.Add(ls);
00048 
00049   while (!ls->done()) {
00050     subprocs.DoWork();
00051   }
00052   ASSERT_TRUE(ls->Finish());
00053   ASSERT_NE("", ls->stdout_.buf_);
00054 
00055   ASSERT_EQ(1, subprocs.finished_.size());
00056 }
00057 
00058 TEST(SubprocessSet, Multi) {
00059   SubprocessSet subprocs;
00060   Subprocess* processes[3];
00061   const char* kCommands[3] = {
00062     "ls /",
00063     "whoami",
00064     "pwd",
00065   };
00066 
00067   for (int i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
00068     processes[i] = new Subprocess;
00069     EXPECT_TRUE(processes[i]->Start(kCommands[i]));
00070     subprocs.Add(processes[i]);
00071   }
00072 
00073   ASSERT_EQ(3, subprocs.running_.size());
00074   for (int i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
00075     ASSERT_FALSE(processes[i]->done());
00076     ASSERT_EQ("", processes[i]->stdout_.buf_);
00077     ASSERT_EQ("", processes[i]->stderr_.buf_);
00078   }
00079 
00080   while (!processes[0]->done() || !processes[1]->done() ||
00081          !processes[2]->done()) {
00082     ASSERT_GT(subprocs.running_.size(), 0);
00083     subprocs.DoWork();
00084   }
00085 
00086   ASSERT_EQ(0, subprocs.running_.size());
00087   ASSERT_EQ(3, subprocs.finished_.size());
00088 
00089   for (int i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
00090     ASSERT_TRUE(processes[i]->Finish());
00091     ASSERT_NE("", processes[i]->stdout_.buf_);
00092     ASSERT_EQ("", processes[i]->stderr_.buf_);
00093     delete processes[i];
00094   }
00095 }
